replies.author: Sonic1997
replies.txt_content:
如果用的是Essentials，只需要简单地在./plugins/Essentials/config.yml搜索blacklist:复制代码然后按照下面的注释填写物品id即可    # Which blocks should people be prevented from placing(禁止放置的方块id)
    placement:               #填在这里前面

    # Which items should people be prevented from using(禁止使用的物品id)
    usage: 

    # Which blocks should people be prevented from breaking(禁止破坏的方块id)
    break:

    # Which blocks should not be pushed by pistons(禁止活塞推动的方块id
    piston:
复制代码
